website_summaries.verdict: Simply the best baby formula mixer available to buy if you want the most amount of convenience.
pros: Comes as an all-in-one formula mixer that requires very little preparation
Uses large reservoirs of formula powder and water to mix a bottle several times before requiring a refill
cons: Lacks the convenient portability of a smaller formula mixer

customer_reviews.title: Very DANGEROUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine does not work as intended!!!, i used different formulas and it kept mixing the wrong quantity of powder into the water. No matter what formula i used or if i cleaned it every 2 or 3 uses. The machine would always mix improperly, my baby was no being fed the right amount of formula and she was not happy or healthy. Like i said, VERY DANGEROUS and would never recommended this product to a parent. Avoid at all costs or risk having your baby be a victim of malnutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Hector C

customer_reviews.title: Moms beware
customer_reviews.text: This product does not mix right!!! The formula to water ratio is not right!!!! This should be taken off the market!! It could have made my son very sick!! I used this machine and my son ate twice as much as he normally did, he spit up and was very fussy (He is not a fussy baby) Thank goodness I caught that it was right after the first feeding! I ordered the Burabi kettle that stays the temp you want for 24 hours and now mix it myself, I deff recommend it!! It’s amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not happy! Had mold!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my babybrezza today I spent $199.99 for it and it literally had mold all over it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley zervas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic, DO NOT STERILIZE, will clog!
customer_reviews.text: The Pro Formula advanced is a godsend (for about the first month) after that it starts to clog! Its a bad design where the formula comes out. So I decided to take it apart and clean it, after hand washing it, i put it in the sterilizer, and it warped! Who makes baby products that you cannot sterilize? This must be the reason they sell replacement parts on their website. So whatever you do, do not sterilize any parts on this machine because they will warp!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be sure it really is working correctly
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it. So simple and it doesn’t bother me to clean it. Genius idea for parents with kids using formula. However... had to switch to Enfamil AR. The machine almost brand new would spit it out in clumps. Watered down and somehow soggy clumps of formula would be in the bottle. I thought it was me, cleaned out everything extra carefully, still same issue. Much formula wasted, very upset had to return
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Too much hassle
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? Per instructions, after every four bottles, you will need to disassemble the funnel parts and wash and wait ‘til dry. The funnel has 4-5 parts. You need to descale monthly. Must let water tank dry out once a day to prevent mold. What is the point? Do those who give glowing reviews skip some of the sanitization instructions throughout use or what? Way too cumbersome! Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: W. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Amount Wasting Formula
customer_reviews.text: I’m having problems with the amount in oz. My baby only drinks formula, 4 oz every 3 hours but lately I noticed he wasn’t drink all, making me throw in the trash the rest, wasting, and I found out the amount coming out is more than I want almost 5oz. Update: I’m changing my review because the customer service explained to me the difference is because the formula with water doesn’t make the amount you choose, if I want 4oz I have to use 3oz and the machine will fill up with 3.75oz. Anyway, you have to call them after purchase a $200 product
customer_reviews.author: Erika Wood

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous, temperamental, high maintenance machine!
customer_reviews.text: This product initially seemed too good to be true but after a few days I’m returning it. First of all, read The NY Times article regarding the class action currently pending alleging that this machine systemically dispenses wrong proportions of formula. This scared me immensely. Upon using it myself, I noticed that it indeed dispenses random amounts of formula. Also, aside from that huge and potentially very dangerous problem, this machine is just too temperamental and too high maintenance. I’m just going to return to making a batch and storing bottles for the day in the fridge. It’s worth the peace of mind knowing what my baby is getting and of course the $200 back in my bank account.
customer_reviews.author: Parisa Khademi

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Makes watered down formula bottles
customer_reviews.text: I started using this machine and after a few days my 3 month old son began spitting up formula and water. Turns out this thing was making watered down bottles as the formula powder ratio was incorrect and could not be corrected. This was thankfully discovered before any actual damage occurred. It may be a pain mixing endless bottles but at least you know the bottle you make yourself has the correct amount of powder.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Is it despensing right amount of formula
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is amazing as far as so easy to use and convenient. However my husband and I noticed our son wanting to ear every 1-2 hours. He is 4 months but was always fussy after feeding. Come to find out the breeza was not despensing the right amount of formula. When we did it manuelly, you can see the difference in the thickness of the milk. I clean the machine weekly and did everything it said to putting it together on the Manuel but still it doea not despence correctly. I'm dissapointed because it is useful especially at night but you can guess how much more formula you need to make it the correct amout. Need to return
customer_reviews.author: Valene

customer_reviews.title: Making parent's lives easier
customer_reviews.text: #1 yes, this is a luxury item...no it's not something I'd deem as a necessity. BUT! wow this item has made my life much easier. It is pricey but those middle of the night feedings are a lot smoother and less stressful. It has some negative reviews because it "clogs" but if you clean it (or even just wipe it out) like you're supposed to do you won't have any problems. The 3 different temperature options are so nice to have as well. I'm super happy I bit the bullet and purchased it...bottle making is so much quicker and easier. You're paying for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Carriere

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Parents need this! We've been using this for almost 2 months. The Breeza faults out after 3 bottles so there's no guess work at when to clean it. It's literally 2 pieces to swish in soapy water & wipe the underside out with a dry paper towel. That's it. Saves SOOO much time & easy to program via the link in the manual for whatever formula u decide to use. When my baby's hungry I can have a measured, warm bottle in 5 seconds. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BUT DOESNT LAST LONG
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It was truly a saving grace!! It makes a bottle in seconds and is the perfect tempature. My only issue (which is a big one) is that it doesn’t last as long as I would think. In the back compartment where you add the water isn’t sealing properly and 9 out of 10 times The water leaks all over my counter. I am very disappointed! I don’t want have to buy another $200 machine for the next baby. I thought this would last me for at least 2 kids and so far hasn’t even made it through one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: Baby Keurig
customer_reviews.text: This is formula mixer is great! Soooo easy to make bottles, even with one hand while holding the baby. I'm pretty sure, at 2 months old, he recognizes the sound of the machine because he calms down when I'm using it! Mixes the formula well; virtually no clumping. Heats the water immediately to the perfect preset temperature. Do you need to clean it regularly and perform maintenance? Yes. But, I expect to do that with most small appliances, so why not this one too? I waited for the price to drop. If you can afford it, buy it, it will make your life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Dom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful but kind of loud
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It is very nice to be able to make a bottle of formula without having to fish a scoop out of a canister of formula. Water comes out a great temperature too. There are two reasons I give it 4 stars though. Firstly, from time to time I can hear a slight electrical buzzing coming from the Breeza(I have it sitting on my end table.) Secondly, when you are making a bottle of formula the machine gets VERY loud. I feel like they could have done something to make it a little quieter. That being said this thing has made my life a whole lot easier!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Life got simple.
customer_reviews.text: I just got 4th baby. Its my first time using this amazing machine. My husband got it for me to make my life little bit easier. BUT LET ME TELL YOU this thing really simple and easy. BUT!!!!! HOW COME MY BABY DONT EAT BOTTLE MILK. Long story short my baby was colic and I wanted the machine fixed all the problems. But he won't drink th bottle and I found the reason there are lots of people left the review thats how I found out. Before you feed the baby please make sure to measure the powder it comes out. Sometimes its different than what u suppose.
customer_reviews.author: GOLDEN

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all!! Very inconsistent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have twin boys to feed. Biggest problem is that it does not serve the same amount consistently. I usually set the machine for 6 oz and it happens to be once 7oz and another time more than 8 oz. It fluctuates between 7 to 8.5 oz. The gap is too much. Sometimes the result of the formula is too thin to eat. So I had to throw them away. Make sure before you buy this to see if it is tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. incredible

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: It is not a bad product, if it works. So i have been using this for 8 months, it does help a lot, when it is working normally. While using this stuff keep having wired problems like having wet powder accumulate when i clean the funnel every 4 uses, or it has this gap suddenly. I found the power weight not that accurate as well after i found the gap.i am hoping this is not gonna hurt my baby and see if this can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: chuanqi huang

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVING/CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best investments I have made in regards to my child. It is just the easiest thing to use when you newborn is crying for her bottle and you need to make it fast. You just set the amount of ounces your baby typically takes and leave it on that. Your settings will stay the same unless you change anything and all you have to simply do is press start and BOOM the formula and water come out together. Just have to frequently keep the machine clean and fill it with water/formula when it runs low. Best investment.... now if only they have something like this for cleaning bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Mauri

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the Formula Pro!
customer_reviews.text: We are huge Baby Brezza fans! We had the Formula Pro with our 1st baby, and loved it. Probably would’ve changed a few things about it, but it was great. I knew I had to have the Advanced model for my new baby, and it’s amazing. It was quick to set up, and I was so excited to see the water temp options on this model, the option to dispense just water, and it’s even FASTER making the bottle! I really hate cleaning this thing, and I hated cleaning my 1st Baby Brezza, but I hate making bottles by hand more, so it’s an easy trade off!
customer_reviews.author: S.C. Bicknell

customer_reviews.title: So helpful, but formula gets stuck in the dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much - it's a dream to mix formula at the exact right temperature, store formula, and make those late night / early morning feeds easier. Only complaint I have is that formula cakes up in the funnel dispenser part pretty often. I clean this thing every night, dry it completely before putting it back, and inevitably throughout the day it collects clumpy chunks of formula in it. I'm also surprised by how much is in there at the end of the day (and he only eats 5x a day!) I'm a little worried that the formula / water mixture is not quite "on" but overall it seems to work great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase since having my baby.
customer_reviews.text: makes bottles in literal seconds. It has made feeding time so much easier for the whole house. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our Baby Brezza for 4 months now. I read most of the reviews prior to purchasing and I’m glad I didn’t let the 1star reviews sway me. We clean it after every 4 uses and just did the once monthly full disassembled clean (which was a breeze) and have been beyond happy with this product. It truly is a game changer. I mean it has completely changed the quality of my family’s life and is worth every penny. If you formula feed your baby, this is well worth the investment. This formula maker is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: LScott

customer_reviews.title: Love but...
customer_reviews.text: We do really love this product but it is kinda a pain to clean. Formula gets stuck in the machine quite often but it’s not hard to clean and takes a little to heat up if you turn off not an awful thing just inconvenient. Also I wish the water tank held more. But it makes our lives so much easier! Cuts night time prep time which makes room for more sleep! Always perfect heat, Never “hot pockets” temp is the same throughout the bottle. I definitely would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Candis

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect amount of formula was dispensed
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great, and the usefulness of the machine is great. The only problem is the machine dispense incorrect amount of formula. We are using European Hipp Organic Combiotic and per instructions we had to use setting number 5 for this particular formula, after we measured the amount of formula dispensed it appeared to be almost half less then it suppose to be per ounce per manufacturer. We tried to find more accurate settings, but still decided to return the machine, since we can not trust it to mix the correct amount of formula when we will need to adjust the ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Katya Seidametova

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Doesn't take up that much space and fits under our cabinets which are very low. So far it has been accurate and temperatures seem good also... It's easy to put formula and water in and simple to use. The only thing I do not like is you have to clean it every four bottles or will not make a bottle if you do not. It is very easy to pop it out wipe down and put back in so the trade off is worth it to me, especially for those night time bottles with multiple babies.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - read about lawsuits!!
customer_reviews.text: Run away from this product. Read the pending lawsuits. Incorrectly measures powder and baby gets watered down formula causing digestive issues. Customer service denies the issue and blames consumer, regardless of large number of people reporting this issue. My daughter followed directions to the letter and kept product clean. Problems started immediately- baby fussy, projectile vomiting and never satisfied. She measured weights of hand mixed bottles to Brezza and it became clear that Brezza was a whole scoop of formula off. As soon as she switched to hand mixed bottles, all digestive and sleep issues resolved immediately. I bought this for her in January to help and it made the baby sick! Customer service absolutely blew her off.
customer_reviews.author: lupiejean

customer_reviews.title: Leaks BADLY!
customer_reviews.text: Used for a few months and now it’s leaking badly. Constantly have to clean the counter from water that leaked out. Also it doesn’t truly measure formula to water ratio. I honestly don’t know if I got a fluke or they all this bad. Would not recommend buying it. Cost to own is just not justified.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Dumps formula in the middle of the night
customer_reviews.text: Product worked perfectly until 4 months of use. We've now had three instances where the machine has turned on in the middle of the night and dumped formula all over our dresser and carpet. One night we were in the middle of cleaning up after it dumped 6 ounces randomly and it dumped another 6 ounces. We will not be plugging it in again. Far too expensive to have this sort of problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pence

customer_reviews.title: Not necessary but makes life much better and worth every cent.
customer_reviews.text: Of course I could manually make a bottle of formula. Just like I could walk to the store. Luckily with modern advancements in technology, we don’t have to. This is a game changer. Late night feeding and ad hoc bottle making is effortless. I got an extra set of the dispensing plastic prices. So we have one clean one ready at all times. Makes life easier. This is worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Grant E Knowles

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT - IT IS NOT SAFE FOR THE BABY AND YOU CAN'T RETURN IT!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this product, it took forever to set it up, then it didn't work. we called customer service and they were not help at all, just said that they hadn't heard of their error code and we just had to return it, which is almost impossible. we live in brooklyn and the nearest kohls (a requirement for returning) is an hour drive - which who has time with a screaming baby. i have never been so disappointed in a product and customer service. also the product is not guaranteed to mix the formula correctly which could make the baby sick, so we don't even trust using it (if it worked). shame on baby brezza.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must if you have a baby.
customer_reviews.text: Even if this only lasts a year it will still be worth the money. This is such a huge help...especially for the night feedings. I love this thing and recommend to anyone who is expecting. Definitely worth the money. No doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Wish We Bought It Sooner
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product for anyone using formula. New parent here so maybe we were doing it the wrong way but we used to mix the formula and heated via a bottle warmer which would take up to 5 minutes. Normally this isn't a big deal but screaming babies at 3am want milk now not later. The BabyBrezza provides a warm full bottle in seconds which made things a lot easier. More of a convenience purchase but simplified our feedings and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Improper water:formula ratios
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this for the convenience of quick night feedings as well as preventing too many clumps and/or bubbles in a hand-shaken bottle. It worked really well up until we noticed it was dispensing too much water for the formula. I clean it multiple times daily as well as made sure we had it on the right settings (which we did) but it still wasn’t dispensing correctly. Who knows how many times it did it before we noticed. For the pure essence of safety, I do not recommend this product. Especially since they charge so much money for the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Bad Funnel - Doesn't Work Now
customer_reviews.text: Ordered replacement funnel since original is defective and will not operate the machine unless it seats correctly. No way to contact company about issue so I ordered the replacement part on 17 June. On June 29 a shipping label was created which meant it was delivered to mail out facility. July 14th still no product after more than a dozen emails all they said is the mail is slow yet it has never been processed by the post office. Its nice when it worked but plastic material degraded in less than a month rendering the entire machine useless. I hand wash in warm water but the part arrived in poor chewed up condition to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Abundo

customer_reviews.title: Recommend... great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a must ... I have my daughter pre made formula for 3 months ... it was getting way to expensive so we bought this and it’s just amazing . Look it up on YouTube . I love the fact that it’s so quick . You do have to clean the filter but it’s fast . This is a great buy if you don’t want lumps and formula bubbles . I bought it here and not the official website because the shipping was faster . For some reason the website takes for ever . I have the sterilizer which is amazing as well
customer_reviews.author: Ilie Camino

customer_reviews.title: I love my Brezza!
customer_reviews.text: My babies milk never has chunks in it and I did not know it would come with the capability of warming the milk when it is made, it does and that made my day when he came home from the hospital. My son refuses to drink non-warmed milk because of this machine and that makes me happy. It is so easy and convenient. Just a great product for new moms who aren’t used to making a perfect bottle. The settings are easy to use and cleaning is a breeze. I love my Brezza!
customer_reviews.author: Rosmite Francois

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Giving this product 5 stars because i’ve seen it used CORRECTLY many times. it shouldn’t ever be that hard to figure out a keurig-like formula dispenser. people shouldn’t be afraid to ask for help if they can’t figure it out, unless it’s actually damaged. i was sooo excited and ready to use this for my baby boy, but i lost him. 💐♥️
customer_reviews.author: Mer

customer_reviews.title: The best time saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a NEED item, it is a WANT item. Its easy enough to mix bottles yourself, but man does this thing make it super easy. And let me tell you, if you have a baby in one hand, you can easily make a bottle with one hand so quick to ease over a hungry baby.
customer_reviews.author: R. F.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This formula maker has changed our lives. The instant bottles saved us for many weeks of colic episodes. This machine is easy to clean, use and adjust to different size bottles and formulas. I have fallen in love with the way this technology has taken the work out of feeding my hungry baby. The ONLY downside is that every 4 bottles you must clean the spout to prevent build up. Which is very manageable and the good of all of the other features outweighs this “step”.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!! Every second matters!!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! It's so fast to make specially at 12, 3am, 5, am no more coming down the stairs to make baby bottle yes! Yes you have to clean it every 4 bottles and it makes noise but I can live with that, the noise don't wake my husband or my newborn baby... This item is a life saver and it's my best friend, lol I highly recommend mom get it!!! It is worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: MissVirgo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine!! Easy to clean, fill and use. We have new twin girls and I debated buying this machine, but so glad we did! The ease of getting bottles ready now is amazingly simple! No more fussing with getting the powder from the scoop all into the bottle while the girls are telling me to hurry. Fast , easy and a Must if especially if you have twins>
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL F

customer_reviews.title: Poured out water/No customer service
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first bottle. I was glad to have a quick easy solution for bottles. The next day it started pouring out all of the water (all over the counter and floor). It has an error code of flashing 2 and solid 8. Customer service does not answer and I left a voicemail with no return. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody I.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I would reccomend this product to anyone who as a baby. Buy it as soon as you determine that you will be giving your child formula. It has made everything a lot easier. Less time needed to make food means more time for important things like tending to your baby or getting a few more minutes of sleep. To the manufacturer, a self clean mode and larger water reservoir would be nice to have, but overall, I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja-Review

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but lasted less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: It broke down after a month. It’s kinda working still, but the machine starts to operate in the middle of the night randomly without touching anything. It makes the mess!! It happended a couple of times and we just plug the machine off so that it doesnt happen again. Is this broken???
customer_reviews.author: M. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Multiple life saver
customer_reviews.text: We have only used it for a week and it is already a life saver. It's a must have for multiples. We are overseas using Korean milk so it's hard translate everytime. It's so nice to be able to have our 3 and 6 yo to be able to help make bottles without wasting milk and making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Do you need it? No. Should you get it? YES! As long as you follow cleaning instructions and choose the right setting for your type of formula there shouldn’t be any problems. People complain that it’s a pain to clean it but you literally need to clean the funnel every 4th bottle and it takes like 30seconds. I feel like the negative reviews are just user errors
customer_reviews.author: Anska

customer_reviews.title: Make my life easier
customer_reviews.text: This new product is much better than the old version. This new version can set up for room temperature and dispose water itself when my baby is thirsty and only need to sip a bit water. It’s convenient to use, especially when I’m alone at home with my baby. Don’t have extra hand to make milk when I’m taking care of my baby. The only shortcoming is for the disposal part, it has to be washed and dried every around 4 times use. I have to wash it 3 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: A Z

customer_reviews.title: One more thing to wash constantly.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a luxury product. I feel that I am constantly washing the parts. It will only make 4 bottles then you have to wash and dry out the dispenser. I’m already washing bottles all day... now this. Therefore you didn’t give it 5 stars. It is convenient when it is washed and dry and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Mergili

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for middle of the night feedings.
customer_reviews.text: Bottles come out perfect temp every time which made feedings even easier. No mess and saves so much time rather than having to make bottles, especially in the middle of the night. Only thing I will say, the funnel the water/formula mixture comes out of, has to be taken out to “clean” every 4 bottles, it’s a little annoying when it doesn’t actually have to be cleaned but other than that tiny thing, I love this. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: TayD

customer_reviews.title: MAKES YOUR LIFE SO MUCH EASIER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of how often you have to clean it, omg this is worth every freakin penny!!! It makes bottles in less than 30 seconds. I almost cried the first time I hit start. Lol
customer_reviews.author: T.Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: No more midnight bottle making hassle!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you babybrezza! I literally carry my device everywhere I travel across the country. The only issue I have is that it’s not compatible yet with the gulf countries formula and therefore I end up sending my baby’s formula all the way to US for them to test it and then send me the appropriate setting.
customer_reviews.author: Talal AlAnsari

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate measurements of water make for possible dangerous formula mixing.
customer_reviews.text: Appeared to work well for the first few weeks but then very obvious errors in measuring water about a month into owning this item. For example, we would punch in 6oz and it would sometimes fill up to 7.5oz. It was unclear how much formula was in each bottle given the discrepancies in measurements we would see. No longer felt it was a safe product to use for our infant. Great concept but our item has terrible execution.
customer_reviews.author: Optimus

customer_reviews.title: Makes watery formula!!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because it mixed formula inconsistently. The formula was watery. Does baby brezza realize how dangerous it is to give an infant watered down formula??? I researched online and found that this problem is not uncommon. I returned the first one, got a replacement and the replacement did the same thing after about a week. Great concept but WOW this is an unacceptable flaw in my opinion. Not happy with this product at all :(
customer_reviews.author: Ava Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Must do maintenance for it to work.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I do love this product. It does save a lot of time. Just using the water function makes it easy as well. The only thing is having to clean the filter often can be annoying. The machine requires you to clean the filter almost after every use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even get this set up properly. It was leaking water everywhere. I immediately returned it. Disappointed as friends had recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Lfc 19

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: A MUST have. Bought for daughter and newborn grandson. He was spitting up a lot when she would make his bottles. This has gives your baby a smooth warm ( choose your temp) bottle. He rarely spits up. Very easy to use for those 2 am bottle feedings
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Bourque

customer_reviews.title: Great for Working Moms!
customer_reviews.text: This is my best friend! LOL! I am a working mom and this prepares my bottles fast! At night, when baby is crying, it takes this 7 seconds to fix a warm bottle. Perfect! It is easy to clean and it also lets you know when there is no water left and when it's time to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!! It's a must have
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST baby purchase we made. It's super easy to use once you program everything. It does require you to clean the dispenser area once every 5 bottles or so to remove build up which is easy. Only negative thing is descaling takes a while and it's hard to read the water refill line. Overall all it's definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Shirina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it caused Belly ache
customer_reviews.text: Yes I know it sounds like the best machine of all times but this thing does not poor the right amount of water and/or powder and have my baby terrible stomach aches! It is too expensive to give it a try! I so wish I could get my money back, after two weeks of using it all I have is a upset baby. Will not recommend it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Pia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I had read prior reviews and almost didn’t buy it. But it is a kurig for baby bottles. I have twins and this is perfect and makes the perfect bottle every time. If you clean it like it instructs you to do, you will not have the problems other reviews state.
customer_reviews.author: Hippo hippo hurray

customer_reviews.title: Truly a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I heard about the lawsuit but did my research on proper cleaning to avoid issues with the formula ratio. Been using this for 2 months and it is by far my favorite baby gadget I could own. I clean the filter well every 4th bottle and my son is happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie South

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in gold
customer_reviews.text: I read some pretty negative reviews on this thing, and decided to try it anyways. Glad we did! cleaning on a regular basis is needed, but it's to be expected. I didn't know how to or need to make a bottle any other way until vacation. Make sure you have the right setting for your formula and you'll be ready to feed that baby!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and daughter in law to make bottles for my grandbaby. They absolutely love it! (especially in the middle of the night feedings ;-) It takes less that a minute to make a bottle and at perfect temperature!
customer_reviews.author: MissyB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Machine works ok, but technically you cannot clean the compartment which contain the formula, because you would need to empty that compartment first, which will contaminate the Formula. But that is not the reason I returned it, what’s worse is you need to clean the funnel everyday. Since it must be 100% dry before putting it back, I have to use paper towel and put it in front of a fan to make sure it is dry. Wasted a lot of time to do that everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Chan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love it so much. My dad bought this for me and wowwww its a time savor. I get bottles within 10 seconds, warmed up and just the right amount of formula. I can’t say enough good things about it, love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the NEW version. I think they fixed some of the problems with mold. We havent had any issues. this machine is AMAZING. It reminds you to clean it every 4 bottles and its super easy to do. No complaints or issues here.
customer_reviews.author: The Wife

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This thing is seriously a lifesaver especially in the middle of the night. Makes bottles in seconds. The only thing I don't like is you have to clean the funnel after every 4 bottles and when refilling the water, it takes a while to heat up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smock

customer_reviews.title: Genius product
customer_reviews.text: This product is brilliant. While having to clean out the spout every five uses or so...it’s really convenient when trying to sooth a crying baby in one hand and Making a bottle in the other hand, especially during the first few months of having a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: As first time parents, we consider this to be a must have. It’s easy to use, easy to clean, and best of all, we can make bottles on the fly without any waiting. We follow all guidelines and instructions for use and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love-Hate Relationship
customer_reviews.text: I have a love-hate relationship with this machine. Bought for my colicky grandson I’m not sure it’s making much difference. It is nice to make a bottle quickly but that’s about it. Probably good for parents in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Quick, simple & easy
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is amazing!! It saves us so much time and I love that my baby gets warm milk in seconds. (And I also love that I don’t have to fumble around the formula can for the scooper and make a mess when I’m making her a bottle in the middle of the night when I’m half asleep.)
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Always cleaning
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good but the machine seems to get clogged with wet formula constantly. I feel like every other day I have to take all the powdered formula out and clean it, because it turns to blobs in the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: OSNIEL MARRERO

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: This formula maker is a life saver for all parents it was so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Baby formula dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my daughter-in-law and son as a baby gift. They keep telling me it is the best and most used gift they got. The review is based on using it myself but mostly their great comments.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product!! Having a ready bottle in under 5 seconds instead of waiting 5 minutes for a bottle to heat up in a bottle warmer is well worth the money. This is a life saver and I am so thankful we found it. We call it our baby Keurig. No more cries as we wait for the bottle to warm up. Easy to use. If there's one thing you must have as a parent to a baby, it's this machine!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift! Easy to use! Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: We found the Baby Brezza when searching how to reduce air bubbles in baby bottles ) I ordered this as gift for my grandson and it has helped his tummy! His parents are enjoying making bottles in the middle of the night...did I say enjoying?! Yep! It works fast! Cleaning it after approx 4 bottles is easy and the cost is well worth it. My daughter and son-in-law love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for Moms
customer_reviews.text: This is like a Keurig for formula. So easy to use - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Allen

customer_reviews.title: All around great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing item! Have purchased many as gifts for baby showers. I wish they had these when I had babies. Easy to use and perfect for middle of night and fast easy bottle preparation!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Basically a baby keurig.
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes life SO much easier! I have a 6 and 7 year old boys and they love making bottles for their baby sister! 😊. The mix comes out just right and the baby is gaining weight perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN JENSEN

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter considers this machine a godsend. My new grandson has gone from being fractious and unhappy to a happy comfortable little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Do not even hesitate to purchase. Regular cleaning is a slight hassle, but the other conveniences more than make up for it. Baby is raising hell you can have a bottle ready in seconds with one hand verses having to put down a screaming hungry baby while fooling around trying to get tap water temp correct, scooping formula correctly, mixing....... Especially when it is 1:00 AM!
customer_reviews.author: John Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for 3 weeks and love it! You do have to clean often but it is quick and easy to do. We've also cleaned with a toothpick like other reviews say to do. It looks nice and is so simple to use. No problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Williams

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for night feeds and making multiple bottles. Given that some reviews say it doesn’t mix properly, I had to test myself and found no issues - this is most likely down to the formula (we use similac) The sceptic that I am I measured by hand the same amount of powder/water and tested side by side with the brezza and was able to get the same amount. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ceez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for babies on 100% formula feeding
customer_reviews.text: This is worth it if your baby prefers formula - especially at night. However, you have to wash it after every forth use. It also wastes a lot of formula which isn't the best considering how expensive formula is.
customer_reviews.author: rubeena razvi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new parents
customer_reviews.text: Perfect purchase and worth every penny. After breastfeeding and having to stop after 6 weeks. The thought of warming bottles every 2 hours was horrible. We bought this to make our lives easier and it did! At first cleaning ever 4 uses seems like a lot, but you get use to it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jougras

customer_reviews.title: Easy made bottles in seconds
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product - I wasn’t going to spend the money but had gift cards for most of the purchase. The reason I decided to get it was because I’ll have a few family members helping care for my child and getting the water to the right temperature and the right amount of formula was better off this way. Having the machine do it for you. It’s annoying to have to clean the spout every 4 bottles - they’ve gotta figure a way to not have to do it as often.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Wasting time !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product, i thought i can save my time for mix formula manually, but every time use this machine 3-4 times i have to opened and cleaned put together or it won't dispense enough formula powder!
customer_reviews.author: Yosia Darmawan

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford this, BUY IT.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. You can make a bottle in 10 seconds flat, and for anyone with a crying hungry baby you’ll know this is huge! If you keep the water full and the funnel think cleaned between bottles, this thing is seriously the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Katz

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: Life saver! Not really but if you get this you’ll be spoiled. Three different temps. Easy to program the formula you use. The only annoying part is you have to clean a piece about every four bottles, but totally worth is. Makes a bottle in seconds, and baby starts eating right away. Perfect for the middle of the night feeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: food is ready in one second
customer_reviews.text: im so happy i bought it!! in one second my baby have food ready at the exact temperature, no more microwave no more testing again and again. im so happy I bought the second one, one in my kitchen one in my bedroom for the night time it.
customer_reviews.author: Esther hen

customer_reviews.title: Great machine when it works right.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this and would have given it a 5 star rating overall until this week. The powder setting keeps resetting to 1. You have to manually move it back every bottle. I have a video of it cycling through. I have twins and it's really frustrating having two hungry babies and trying to verify machine settings before you can make bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kaari M

customer_reviews.title: Great for late night bottle making.
customer_reviews.text: Time saver. I like to invest in products I’ll use daily. We make 8 bottles a day. This makes that easier. Makes late bottle making so easy and fast which is appreciated when you have a screaming baby waiting. Love that the bottle is already warm and the machine has lots of powder settings if you change formulas. Saving it for the next kiddo too.
customer_reviews.author: Gford33

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: This has made my life so simple I love this. It's easy to clean and makes night times 100% better! Do your self a favor and buy this with all your gift cards!
customer_reviews.author: wife,mom,zookeeper

customer_reviews.title: Must have !!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. Yes you have to clean it every 4 bottles you make but the amount of time it saves ? Whether your baby is fussy or easy going, when they’re hungry, they’re hungry. The actual making process takes less than 30 seconds to make and the formula comes out heated ! What a life changer!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie & Richard Harrison

customer_reviews.title: We love ours
customer_reviews.text: We love ours very convenient in the middle of the night and very convenient for warm water without putting in the microwave. The only downside is after every 4 bottles cleaning and making sure you get in there and clean the extra formula powder off
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: The older model was better
customer_reviews.text: It clogs up after using it a couple of times. You need to clean so you can use it again a couple a times
customer_reviews.author: Juany

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Late night life saver. We all made that huge mess on our nightstand trying to make a bottle. The easy led display and functionality make it perfect and easy to make a bottle faster than you could measure water. Plus my formula last longer from less exposure to the humidity (opening/closing) and the temp is always perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond May

customer_reviews.title: Super and great for all motherhood
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my sister’s newborn baby girl. I used older version myself and is great. All in one touch as long as you set up correctly by formula brand. Easy to set up and fill water. As an experienced mother, you never know how easy and time saving it can help you when wake up at night for feeding. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda G.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: So perfect , it takes only seconds to make the formula. The machine also counts the times you make formulas and remind you to clean it. But what i didnt like is that its only 110v , i wish it was 110v - 240v.
customer_reviews.author: a

product_meta.title: New and Improved Baby Brezza Formula Pro Advanced Formula Dispenser Machine - Automatically Mix a Warm Formula Bottle Instantly - Easily Make Bottle with Automatic Powder Blending
product_meta.description: Baby Brezza Formula Pro Advanced is the most advanced way to automatically make a warm, formula bottle instantly. No measuring, no mixing and no fuss. You can customize the perfect bottle for your baby by choosing 1 ounce increments between 2-10 ounces, 1 of 3 temperature settings or dispensing water only. It works with virtually all brands of formula and all bottle brands and sizes. BPA-FREE.
feature_bullets: Most advanced way to automatically make a warm, formula bottle instantly
Patented mixing technology automatically mixes formula and water to perfect consistency*. Works with virtually all formula brands and all bottle brands/sizes
Fully customizable – choose 1 ounce increments between 2-10 ounces, 3 temperature settings and formula/water or water only dispensing
1 year limited warranty (not valid on purchases shipped outside US); Works with 120 volt outlets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars982 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
